duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and analyze business processes suitable for RPA automation using RPA tools.
Gather requirements and define RPA solutions, working with the Program Manager to assess feasibility and develop initial architecture.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful implementation of RPA solutions, and maintain documentation of RPA solutions.
Manage production scheduling, deployment, and management of RPA processes, providing direction and scheduling of projects to the Development team.
Define benchmarks of the process in their As-Is state and compare against the RPA solution, troubleshooting technical issues with the Development team.
Provide support for production systems and the development team during weekends and nights.

education_certification.credential: College diploma or university degree in the field of business administration, computer science, finance, or management information systems
2+ years of experience as a Developer
Strong interpersonal and communication skills with the ability to effectively communicate with stakeholders at all levels of the organization.
Excellent analytical and creative problem-solving skills.
Logical and efficient, with keen attention to detail.
Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks while under pressure.
Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.
Experience with RPA a Plus but will be taught
